ingredients.ingredient: Â½ cup olive oil, or as needed
1 head garlic, cloves peeled and coarsely chopped
1 dried red chile pepper, seeded and chopped, or to taste
1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook garlic slowly in oil until golden and fragrant, don't let it burn
Add shrimp only after garlic is ready; they need just 2-3 minutes cooking time
Use a generous amount of heat to get a slight sear on the shrimp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach me the proper technique for pan-frying shrimp in garlic-infused oil without overcooking them.
